title: Here's what history says about stock-market performance during the Thanksgiving week
text:
Apple Car could double company's revenue and market value, says Morgan Stanley

A hypothetical Apple Inc.-designed car may be years away, but it could already be helping the company's stock, in the view of one analyst. See full story.

Why that ‘free' supermarket turkey isn't really free

In this year of turkey inflation, food retailers and cellphone companies are rolling out promotions to bag a free bird. But consumers should shop carefully. See full story.

Kyle Rittenhouse not guilty verdict reactions: From ‘Justice wins the day' to ‘Only in America'

President Biden: 'I stand by what the jury has to say. The jury system works.' Here are reactions from lawmakers, civil rights leaders on Rittenhouse acquittal See full story.

We want to retire in an East Coast community that ‘leans toward multicultural, progressive and educated' and has lots of golf — where should we go?

Also on the list: mild, four-season weather; near some water, not necessarily the ocean; good for the adult children and their families. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Frozen turkeys and hot oil are a dangerous combination. See full story.
